name: Monstera
description: Monstera is a popular indoor plant known for its large, glossy leaves and easy-care nature.

name: Rubber Plant
description: Rubber Plant is a hardy indoor plant with glossy, dark green leaves that can tolerate low light.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Fiddle Leaf Fig is a trendy indoor plant with large, violin-shaped leaves that add elegance to any space.

name: Snake Plant
description: Snake Plant is a low-maintenance indoor plant with tall, upright leaves that thrive in various light conditions.

name: Peperomia
description: Peperomia is a compact indoor and very lovely plant with attractive foliage patterns and a variety of leaf shapes.

name: Jade
description: Jade is a succulent plant with fleshy leaves that require minimal watering, making it perfect for busy plant enthusiasts.

name: Peace Lily
description: Peace Lily is an elegant indoor plant with dark green leaves and white flowers, known for its air-purifying qualities.

name: Peacock Plant
description: Peacock Plant, also known as Calathea, features colorful foliage patterns that resemble the feathers of a peacock.

name: Ficus
description: Ficus is an indoor plant available in various varieties, including Fiddle Leaf Fig and Weeping Fig, adding lush greenery to interiors.

name: Pothos
description: Pothos, also known as Devil's Ivy, is a popular trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves that can thrive in a variety of light conditions.
